title: Happy Birthday, Makiko!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>...Alright, no one’s around. Finally, some peace and...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>FOUND YOU!!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Kyaaah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Geez, even if you run away, Kasumin and the others will definitely find you, so just give up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>No way!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Whyyyyyyy won’t you just let us celebrate your birthday!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Because... I mean, a birthday party for a high schooler... That’s kind of...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kind of what? Embarrassing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>...Yeah, you could say that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>...Alright, I get it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You do? Then, please tell everyone. I appreciate them wanting to celebrate, but—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>From now on, we’re ALWAYS going to have a birthday party for Makiko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>If we celebrate you enough, you won’t feel embarrassed anymore~! Kasumin’s a genius!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>No, that’s not what I meant... Kasumi, wait a sec!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>That’s exactly why we’re heading to the birthday party venue! Let’s go! It’s okay to want to be celebrated, Makiko! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
